title: Gastronomie Stainless Steel Spoon
description: Gastronomie Bouillon Spoons are highly polished surface is hard wearing, thick, easy to clean, and hygienic. Advanced manufacturing methods plus traditional craftsmanship guarantees flawless product quality. Absolutely indestructible and thanks to the density and strength of the material, stability is guaranteed.High quality stainless steel makes it easy to cleanBoarder on each handle of the spoonGreat size spoon for cereal and functionalityComes in 12-peice set
